text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock @BorisJohnson Heard Hancock on @NickFerrariLBC show. He has a tough job but his refusal to use the word 'mistakes' in relation to the Govt's response - & the death, from coronavirus, of Intisar Chowdhury's Dad, an NHS Doctor - was callous & disrespectful. Keep the pressure on, Piers.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
